tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PostSentimentAnalysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES SocialMediaPosts(post_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES SentimentCategories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                      post_content TEXT,
                      post_date TIMESTAMP,
                      sentiment_score FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                      username VARCHAR(50),
                      email VARCHAR(100),
                      location VARCHAR(50);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis_results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                                  post_id INT,
                                  sentiment_category_id INT,
                                  sentiment_score FLOAT,
                                  FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES social_media_posts(post_id),
                                  FOREIGN KEY (sentiment_category_id) REFERENCES sentiment_categories(category_id);

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_text TEXT,
    user_id INT,
    post_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sentiment_label VARCHAR(20)
);
